pages.title: Altar Boosters
pages.text: Certain objects, mundane or otherwise, known as foci, can be placed on the Altar to boost some of its capabilities, like range, recharge rate or maximum power. Only one of each type will have an effect, so it's better to use more powerful foci rather than using more of the same one.

pages.title: Skulls
pages.text: $(item)Skeleton Skull$():$(br)+10 Recharge Rate$(br)x2 Max Power$(p)$(item)Wither Skeleton Skull$():$(br)+20 Recharge Rate$(br)x3 Max Power$(p)$(item)Player Head$():$(br)+30 Recharge Rate$(br)x4 Max Power$()

pages.title: Others
pages.text: $(item)Arthana$():$(br)+16 Range$(p)$(item)Mystic Branch$():$(br)+1 Enchantment Level$(p)$(item)Pentacle$():$(br)x2 Recharge Rate (applied after all other effects)$(p)The effect of these items are not mutually exclusive.

pages.title: Infinity
pages.text: $(item)Infinity Egg$():$(br)x10 Recharge Rate$(br)x10 Max Power$(p)All effects are applied after all others, including $(item)Pentacle$().
